biog.entry.name: ELLIOT, the Hon. Maria Justine
biog.entry.description: Biography for ELLIOT, the Hon. Maria Justine
biog.entry.electorate.name: Member for Richmond (NSW)
biog.entry.title: Biography for ELLIOT, the Hon. Maria Justine
biog.entry.electorate.state.name: Member for Richmond (NSW)
biog.entry.party.name: Australian Labor Party

parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the House of Representatives for Richmond, New South Wales, 2004, 2007, 2010 and 2013.

ministerial.appointments.title: Ministerial Appointments
ministerial.appointments.para: Parliamentary Secretary for Trade from 14.9.10 to 4.2.13.

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: House of Representatives Standing: Health and Ageing from 2.12.04 to 17.10.07; Regional Australia from 6.2.13; Publications from 14.5.13; Petitions from 4.12.13 (Deputy Chair from 11.12.13).
Joint Statutory: Law Enforcement from 5.12.13 to 16.7.14; Australian Commission for Law Enforcement Integrity from 16.7.14.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: BA (Qld), GradDip in Human Resources and Industrial Relations (Griffith).
Juvenile Justice Conference Convener, NSW Dept of Juvenile Justice 2002-03.

electorate.title: Electorate
electorate.para: Location: New South Wales north coast; it includes the towns of Bangalow, Brunswick Heads, Byron Bay, Kingscliff, Lennox Head, Mullumbimby, Murwillumbah, Nimbin, Ocean Shores, Pottsville, Suffolk Park and Tweed Heads.

Industries: Tourism, commercial fishing, agriculture including dairy, beef cattle, tropical fruits, sugarcane, coffee and macadamia nuts, sugar processing, timber, light engineering, boat building and cottage industries.
State electorates: Richmond includes the New South Wales Assembly electorate of Tweed, and parts of Ballina and Lismore.
